entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tab between controls in a Grid not working on MacOS #19988
  • Image PointerGestureRecognizer PointerEntered and PointerExited Events not firing #19986
  • Launch and Debug for Mac Catalyst from Visual Studio Code succeeds but does not launch app #19985
  • Android: SecureStorage Adding a value after calling RemoveAll() will not persist the value #19983
  • Calling API method to retrieve byte array fails in MAUI Android app #19980
  • Release version of .NET MAUI 70 crashes on startup #19977
  • My firstMAUI APP PROJECT CRASHED WITH THE ERROR The program '[4376] MyFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005). OS Version : Windows 10 pro 22H2 #19974
  • Issue with the one-way binding mode in the CustomControl #19972
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Implement PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #19970
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Implement TabbedPage HeaderIconsEnabled Platform Specific #19969
    Backlog
  • Datepicker date format display incorrect in windows but ok on android #19967
  • [WinUI] Typing in the editor will cause the D10 page to get stuck. #19966
    Backlog
  • [Bug][Android] Memory leak in FlyoutBehavior? #19960
    Backlog

Closed

  • Custom Font Not Loading on iOS in Blazor MAUI App (.net 8) #19734
  • Binding both IsVisible and ImageSource to Button causes it to not show the image #19798
  • I am getting Error loading font 'Assets/Fonts/Tahoma.ttf' in my log file, though app is working #19815
  • iOS App extensions with UseMauiEssentials=true don't bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll #19756
  • Maui Nightly Android 34 - Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged doesnt get fired #19975
  • [Android] Unloaded event is incorrectly raised during navigation for a view in a custom layout #16697
    Backlog
  • Error when trying to start the program #19979
  • Permission for Notifications #12291
    Backlog
  • Add permission request for POST_NOTIFICATION to essentials for Android 13 and up #11476
    Backlog
  • [Android] CollectionView scrolling is not smooth and bounces #14711
    Backlog
  • WinUI TitleView is offset incorrectly from the top of the page #14715
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Setting CollectionView.ItemSizingStrategy to MeasureFirstItem causes StackLayout to not respond to content having IsVisible set to false #14746
  • Platform Specifics are not working #5856
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [regression/7.0.0] Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14125
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Error when Printing through JS when using .NET Maui Blazor Hybrid #12761
  • Calls to retrieve large byte array in MAUI Android app never completes #19698
  • Net Maui on platform Windows PointerOver and Selected states is not working together ? #19708
  • WebView control not loading document from the local file storage #19743
  • iOS Memory issue #19686
  • Transparency of BottomNavigation View in Shell Tabbar is not working properly(Android) #19777

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    community ✨
  • Reduce casting in TemplateUtilities #19982
    community ✨
  • [main] Update version for nightly #19981
  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968
    community ✨
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Optimize IndexOf lookups #19963
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • reduce converter instances #19962
    community ✨
  • use raw string literals #19961
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix condition to bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll in app extensions on Apple platforms. Fixes #19756. #19757
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #19824
    community ✨
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞, stale
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • [iOS] Update to stable iOS for xcode 15.1 #19940
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3

Updated

  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [iOS] Fix WordWrap not working when Padding is set on Label #16136
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label, stale, Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
